Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its high quality and versatility, I estimate its worth to be around $10,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects my commitment to making high-quality solutions accessible while ensuring a fair return on investment for me. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
